On-prem

When following https://helm.sh/docs/using_helm/#example-deploy-tiller-in-a-namespace-restricted-to-deploying-resources-only-in-that-namespace, I end up with the problem of:
```
helm install nginx --tiller-namespace foo --namespace foo
Error: failed to download "nginx" (hint: running `helm repo update` may help)
```
I have of course adjusted 'foo' to be used instead of 'tiller-world' in the example. Running the recommended command doesn't help. The documentation should be updated I guess to reflect a real chart that can be installed out of the box.
